News.headline: 50/50 Draw Information
News.short_description: Information regarding the 50/50 draw for the next three home games.
News.description:
For the next three home fixtures against Torquay United, Worthing/Hemel Hempstead and Solihull Moors the 50/50 draw will have a prize for second place which will be a copy of Football Manager 2017.

50/50 tickets can be purchased on match days for £1.00. 

If you would like to buy a copy of Football Manager 2017 we sell these in the club shop or on our Online Shop, at the reduced Dagger's price of £25.00 instead of the RRP of £34.99. 

To go to the Daggers Online Shop click here.
